name: A Heist at the Museum
description:
A simple game for HonestDan's Honest Jam IV. Your goal is to find a specific painting or object in the museum. You can identify the painting by shining your torch on it to highlight it in blue. But beware of the guards, once they see you or your flashlight, you lose

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Q/E - Rotate camera

F - Interact

Scrollwheel up/down - Increase torch brightness

Scrollwheel button: toggle torch

Mouse - Look
